nodes.text: Darkside was a sector of the planet of Coruscant that was located in the Coruscant underworld.

Darkside was located one kilometer beneath the upper levels of Coruscant, although it was between three and four kilometers above the planet's surface. It was divided into four sectors: the Industrial Sector, the Recycling Sector, the Residential Sector, and the Services Sector.
In 19 BBY, the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar traveled to Darkside, following the destruction of the Almas Academy. He was tracked there by the Heroes of Cularin, who attacked and defeated him.
